snippet: Elan, an Irish drug maker that is the target of a hostile takeover, agreed to pay $1 billion for a share of royalties on new drugs from Theravance of the United States.
abstract: Elan, an Irish drug maker that is the target of a hostile takeover, agreed to pay $1 billion for a share of royalties on new drugs from Theravance of the United States.

headline.main: Elan in Deal on Drug Royalties
